analysis.summary: Incident involves multiple offences: Murder, Attempt to Murder.

sections.punishment: Up to 10 years imprisonment (Life if hurt caused)

constitution.title: Protection of Life and Personal Liberty
constitution.description: No person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except according to procedure established by law.

constitution.title: Equal Justice and Free Legal Aid
constitution.description: The State shall provide free legal aid by suitable legislation or schemes to ensure opportunities for securing justice are not denied to any citizen.

guidance: Multiple potential offences have been identified in this report.
Since cognizable offence(s) are involved, police are duty-bound to register an FIR.
Preserve any digital or physical evidence immediately.
A detailed statement for each identified offence should be recorded.

firData.narrative:
FIRST INFORMATION REPORT (Under Section 154 Cr.P.C.)
(Standard Form No. 1 - Detailed AI Draft)
======================================================================

1. DISTRICT: [AS PER JURISDICTION]    P.S: [NEAREST STATION]
   YEAR: 2026    FIR NO: [PENDING]    DATE: 2/9/2026

2. ACTS & SECTIONS:
   - Primary Act: Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS), 2023
   - Sections: BNS 103(1) (IPC 302), BNS 109 (IPC 307)

3. OCCURRENCE OF OFFENCE:
   - Date/Time: Recorded as per incident metadata.
   - Information Received at P.S.: 2/9/2026 at 10:53 AM

4. TYPE OF INFORMATION: Written / Digital Submission

5. PLACE OF OCCURRENCE:
   - Precise Location: Reported Online
   - Distance from P.S.: [TO BE VERIFIED]

6. COMPLAINANT / INFORMANT DETAILS:
   - Name: [AS PER KYC]
   - Contact: [AS PER RECORD]

7. DETAILS OF ACCUSED: [KNOWN / UNKNOWN / UNDER INVESTIGATION]

8. CONTENTS OF FIR (Narrative Brief Facts):
----------------------------------------------------------------------
IT IS RESPECTFULLY SUBMITTED that the complainant reports as follows:

"attempt to murder"

LEGAL EVALUATION:
The collective facts stated above disclose the commission of COGNIZABLE offence(s). The following legal sections are attracted based on the distinct criminal acts reported:
   (1) Murder - Covered under BNS 103(1) (IPC 302)
   (2) Attempt to Murder - Covered under BNS 109 (IPC 307)

9. ACTION TAKEN:
   Since the above report reveals commission of offence(s) as mentioned at Item No. 2, the case is registered and investigation has been initiated.

[AI GENERATED DRAFT - SUBJECT TO OFFICER VERIFICATION]
